html:
BHARAT STERILE PRIVATE LIMITED

VEHICLE PASS

Pass No: {{ doc.name }}

Vehicle No: {{ doc.vehicle_number }}

Vehicle Type: {{ doc.vehicle_type }}

Driver Name: {{ doc.driver_name }}

Mobile: {{ doc.mobile_number }}

Mobile: {{ doc.mobile_number }}

In Time: {{ frappe.utils.format_datetime(doc.creation) }}

Date & Time (In):_________________

Store Manager Signature:_________________

Driver Signature:_________________

Notes:_________________

No vehicle driver or occupant shall photocopy, record, or capture photographs or videos of any documents, materials, equipment, or facilities within the premises without prior written authorization from Management.

Vehicle drivers and occupants are strictly prohibited from entering, accessing, or interfering with any manufacturing facility, production area, manufacturing process, or controlled environment unless expressly authorized. Any unauthorized act shall be treated as a breach of company policy, and full responsibility shall lie with the vehicle owner/driver. Only items expressly required for the approved purpose are permitted inside the premises. All unauthorized electronic devices, materials, tools, or belongings must be deposited with security personnel at the entry gate. The entire premises, including vehicle movement and parking areas, are under continuous CCTV surveillance. Entry of the vehicle constitutes irrevocable consent to video and audio recording, with no right to objection, claim, or dispute.Issuance and signing of this vehicle pass confirm acceptance of all company rules, safety regulations, and confidentiality obligations. This vehicle pass is valid for a maximum period of eight (8) hours from the time of issue. Any extension beyond the approved duration requires prior authorization and formal renewal. For vehicle unloading and/or loading purposes, the vehicle pass must be mandatory signed and authorized by the Store Manager

Thank You
name: Vehicle In Receipt

html:
BHARAT STERILE PRIVATE LIMITED

VISITOR PASS

Visitor Pass Number: {{ doc.name }}

Whom To Meet: {{ doc.whom_to_meet }}

Visitor Company Name: {{ doc.company_name }}

Date And Time: {{ doc.in_time }}

Purpose: {{ doc.purpose }}

Number Of people accompanying the visitor

Attendee Time:_________________

Attendee Signature:_________________

Visitor Signature:_________________

Notes:

No visitor shall photocopy, record, or capture photographs or videos of any documents, materials, equipment, or facilities within the premises without prior written authorization from the Management. Visitors are strictly prohibited from entering, accessing, or interfering with any manufacturing facility, production area, manufacturing process, or controlled environment unless expressly authorized.

Any unauthorized act or violation shall be deemed a breach of company policy, and the visitor shall be solely liable for all consequences arising from there.Visitors may carry only those items expressly required for the approved meeting or purpose

All unauthorized electronic devices, materials, tools, or belongings must be deposited with security personnel at the entry gate.The entire premises are under continuous CCTV surveillance

By entering the premises, visitors irrevocably consent to video and audio recording of their activities and waive any right to objection, claim, or dispute in this regard.

Visitors must sign the visitor pass/register acknowledging acceptance of all applicable company rules, safety regulations, and confidentiality obligations. The visitor pass shall remain valid for a maximum period of eight (8) hours from the time of issue. Any extension beyond the approved duration shall require prior authorization and formal renewal of the pass.

Thank You
name: Visitor In Receipt

html:
BHARAT STERILE PRIVATE LIMITED

EMPLOYEE PASS

Employee Pass Number: {{ doc.name }}

Employee Name: {{ doc.emplyoee }}

Department: {{ doc.department }}

Designation: {{ doc.designation }}

Shift / Timing: {{ doc.shift_timing }}

Date of Issue: {{ doc.issue_date }}

Authorized Signatore:_________________

Employee Signature:_________________

Notes:

This pass is company property and must be carried and displayed by the employee always within the premises. Employees are strictly prohibited from photographing, recording, or copying any documents, data, materials, equipment, or manufacturing processes without written authorization from Management.

Entry into manufacturing areas, restricted zones, or controlled environments is permitted only as per job role, departmental authorization, and safety guidelines.

Employees must comply with all company policies, safety procedures, confidentiality obligations, and statutory regulations always. Misuse, loss, or damage of the employee pass must be reported immediately to HR/Security

Unauthorized use or violation may lead to disciplinary action. The employee pass is non-transferable and shall be surrendered upon separation, suspension, or as directed by Management.

Thank You
name: Employee In Receipt

html:
BHARAT STERILE PRIVATE LIMITED

COURIER PASS

Courier Pass Number: {{ doc.name }}

Courier Company Name: {{ doc.courier_agency_name }}

Courier Person Name: {{ doc.courier_person_name }}

Courier Person Contact No: {{ doc.courier_person_contact_no }}

Courier From: {{ doc.courier_from }}

Courier To: {{ doc.courier_to }}

Tracking To: {{ doc.tracking_number }}

Courier Type: {{ doc.courier_type }}

Number of Packages: {{ doc.no_of_packages }}

Date & Time (In): {{ doc.time_in }}

Security In-Charge Signature:_________________

Courier Person Signature:_________________

Note:

Courier personnel are permitted entry strictly for delivery or pickup activities only and shall not access any manufacturing, production, or restricted areas of the premises.Photography, videography, audio recording, or photocopying of any documents, materials, equipment, or facilities is strictly prohibited without prior written authorization from Management.

Courier personnel shall carry only the consignment approved for delivery or pickup. No additional items, electronic devices, or belongings are permitted beyond the security checkpoint unless authorized. All courier movement within the premises shall be under the supervision of security personnel or an authorized company representative. The entire premises are under continuous CCTV surveillance. Entry implies irrevocable consent to video and audio recording, and courier personnel waive any right to objection, claim, or dispute.

Courier personnel must comply with all security instructions, safety rules, and confidentiality requirements while inside the premises. Any loss, damage, safety breach, or policy violation caused by the courier personnel shall be the sole responsibility of the courier company and the individual courier person. This courier pass is valid only for the approved transaction and for a maximum duration of four (4) hours from the time of issue, unless otherwise authorized.

Thank You
name: Courier In Receipt
